tool_description:
Comprehensive SMS messaging functions.

Direct UK connections, set the sender ID and send texts up to 612 characters. Send SMS to the UK and Europe.
Functions include: Send SMS, Receive SMS, Schedule SMS, Delivery Reporting, Branch Level Identification.
You can also control your Text Marketer account programmatically, for example:
Inject mobile numbers direct into your account, 
create new sub accounts and move credits between them
and create new groups. Used by well know brands through to start ups, low cost and reliability is our strength.

See read me to give it a try.
name: SMS Text messaging  functions
title: SMS Text messaging  functions

api_list.name: Available Delivery Reports
api_list.description: Get a list of delivery reports available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com/deliveryReports"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com/deliveryReports"

api_list.name: SMS Credits
api_list.description: See how many credits you have left, 1 credit = 1 sms (160 chars)

api_list.name: Get a Delivery Report
api_list.description: Get the contents of a delivery report whose name is '<name>' as derived from deliveryReports. Using a name of 'all' retrieves all reports.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: When we receive a delivery report from the operator for a message that you sent, this gets added to a delivery report on your account with a standardised name. The naming format is as follows:  GatewayAPI_DD-MM-YY where  • DD is the day in the month • MM is the month • YY is the year

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com/deliveryReport/GatewayAPI_04-01-13"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com/deliveryReport/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nickrich-send-an-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
